name: Amber
desc: A MainDPS who focuses on charged shots. Her low burst cooldown also allows her to support using 'Elegy of the End'

name: Ganyu
desc: A MainDPS who focuses on charged shots. Her cryo damage increase also makes her a powerful support

name: Kokomi
desc: A support who outputs an incredible amount of healing, hydro application and solid damage

name: Zhongli
desc: Provides a near-invulnerable shield and decent damage and CC

name: Shenhe
desc: A subDPS with solid damage buffs

name: Kazuha
desc: A supporting character with massive elemental damage buffs

name: Rosaria
desc: A subDPS with solid cryo application. Also makes a decent trigger for reverse melt
